content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Wednesday April 30, 2025 

Today is an “A” Day 

  •  Jazz Band Club will rehearse this evening from 6:30-7:30 in the Band room. 

 

  • Best Buddies will meet today at 2:30 in the LGR. Can’t wait to see you there! 

 

 *Today’s lunch is a toasted ham & cheese pretzel roll, tomato soup, goldfish crackers and cucumbers.  

  Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND! 

 As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
